about_the_game:
• simple Mechanics

No complex operations or frequent interactions are needed. Just plant the seeds, make a few clicks, and let time do the rest.

  • zen Atmosphere

The apple tree, filled with zen vibes and reverent prayer, offers relaxation for both mind and body during the waiting process.

  • relaxing Experience

There is no need to stay online continuously. The apple tree grows on its own, and you can return anytime to check its progress.

  • waiting For Fruits

Patience is the core of the game. By waiting, witness the entire process from seed to mature fruit, experiencing the miracle of nature and a sense of accomplishment.

Fruits will appear every 3 and 18 hours, with the magical apple tree bearing various extraordinary fruits.

short_description: In Apple Tree, an idle game, plant seeds and wait for fruits to grow. Be patient and watch the miracle unfold. With a serene atmosphere and simple mechanics, it offers a relaxing experience. Whether taking a break or seeking a meditative activity, Apple Tree provides a tranquil escape.
